content.text:
{ "resume": "

Eduardo Fleck Dalla Vecchia

Senior Software Engineer

eduphp83@gmail.com | +55 54 981212631 | Itapema, SC, Brazil | github.com/eduPHP | linkedin.com/in/edu-php

Professional Summary

Seasoned Senior Software Engineer with over 7 years of experience developing reliable, scalable, and maintainable solutions for high-impact projects across multiple industries. Expert in the Laravel ecosystem and the modern JavaScript stack, specializing in integrating complex payment gateways, streamlining business processes, and contributing to multi-disciplinary remote teams. Demonstrated ability to lead and mentor teams, applying Agile methodologies, TDD, BDD, and clean code principles to deliver outstanding results in both independent and collaborative settings. Excels in asynchronous communication and thrives in fast-paced, remote environments.

Technical Skills

Languages & Frameworks: PHP (7+ yrs), Laravel (7+ yrs), Vue.js, ES6, TypeScript, Java, C#, Clojure, Rust, Angular, React, React Native
Front-end: Tailwind CSS, Alpine.js, Livewire, Material CSS, Bootstrap
Back-end & Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, Node.js, Redis, REST, WebSockets
Testing & DevOps: TDD, BDD, PHPUnit, Docker (5 yrs), Bash Scripting, Automated Tests, Queues
Tools & Other: Git, AWS S3, Jira, Trello, Notion, Swagger API Docs

Professional Experience

Full Stack Engineer

NeonBang | San Francisco, CA (Remote) | May 2022 – Apr 2025

  • Developed and maintained high-quality TALL stack applications for diverse industries including energy, water treatment, calibration, and insurance.
  • Modernized features for both new and legacy Vue.js applications.
  • Contributed to the adoption and continuous improvement of Agile processes.
  • Provided expertise in PHP, JavaScript, AWS, and related technologies.

Backend Engineer

Atlas Technologies | Pelotas, RS, Brazil (Remote) | Dec 2021 – Apr 2022

  • Developed Laravel microservices and maintained mission-critical backend applications.
  • Improved automated testing coverage and deployment processes.
  • Reviewed team code for adherence to best practices.

Project Leader / Full Stack Developer / Backend Developer

BuilderAll | Orlando, FL (Remote) | Jul 2017 – Dec 2021

  • Led a team of 5 developers and implemented Agile methods to enhance project delivery.
  • Authored a robust backend marketplace tool and integrated Paypal split payments.
  • Developed a flexible payment platform supporting 12 gateways (Stripe, Paypal, etc.).
  • Rebuilt legacy payment systems leveraging queues and external microservices for scalability.
  • Managed workflows using Trello, GitHub Projects, and documented APIs with Swagger.

Education & Certifications

Bachelor in Systems Analysis and Development
University of Passo Fundo (UPF), 2015 – 2018
Bootcamp in Node.js Ecosystem
Rocketseat, 2020
Patterns and Software Architecture Courses
Laracasts (2024), Alura (2021)

Languages

English (Advanced, C1 EF SET), Portuguese (Native)

Previous Experience

Tech Lead

Base Informática | Soledade, RS, Brazil | Mar 2014 – Jul 2017

  • Led technical projects, provided support, and improved software solutions for local businesses.

Support Analyst

Coagrisol NET | Soledade, RS, Brazil | Jul 2011 – Aug 2013

  • Analyzed, supported, and maintained network and IT infrastructure for clients.

Projects & Community

  • Laravel Ecosystem Contributor: Submit improvements and fixes for open-source tools.
  • Docker-based Environment Manager: Simplifies developer environment setup.
  • AI Resume Optimizer: Built an AI-powered tool to enhance CVs for targeted roles.
  • Biblioteka: Library management app using Laravel & Vue.js.
  • RSS News Aggregator: Study project using Next.js, TailwindCSS, and MongoDB.
Available for remote work or relocation to Canada through visa sponsorship.
", "compatibility_score": "95", "professional_summary": "Seasoned Senior Software Engineer with over 7 years of experience developing reliable, scalable, and maintainable solutions for high-impact projects across multiple industries. Expert in the Laravel ecosystem and the modern JavaScript stack, specializing in integrating complex payment gateways, streamlining business processes, and contributing to multi-disciplinary remote teams. Demonstrated ability to lead and mentor teams, applying Agile methodologies, TDD, BDD, and clean code principles to deliver outstanding results in both independent and collaborative settings. Excels in asynchronous communication and thrives in fast-paced, remote environments.", "cover_letter": [ "Hello, and thank you for considering my application! I am excited about the prospect of contributing my expertise as a Senior Software Engineer in Canada. Over the last seven years, I have refined my abilities through developing and launching scalable solutions for companies around the world, including extensive experience with Laravel, Vue.js, and robust payment integrations.", "I bring a strong track record collaborating within remote, Agile teams, leading multi-disciplinary projects, and ensuring code quality through TDD and BDD principles. My hands-on approach in both backend and frontend development, along with my technical leadership—in both mentorship and project design—aligns well with the rigorous standards of leading Canadian tech teams.", "I look forward to bringing my technical skills and proactive communication style to your organization. I am open to relocation through visa sponsorship and am enthusiastic about making a positive impact with your team. Thank you for your consideration!" ], "findings": [ { "title": "Extensive Laravel Ecosystem Expertise", "description": "Over 7 years of deep Laravel experience, including TALL stack, modern JavaScript frameworks, and backend integrations.", "group": "strong_alignment" }, { "title": "Remote/Distributed Team Leadership", "description": "Demonstrated ability to thrive, mentor, and deliver results in asynchronous and cross-time zone environments.", "group": "strong_alignment" }, { "title": "Agile and Best Practices Adherence", "description": "Solid foundation in Agile workflows, TDD/BDD, clean code, and DevOps, which are highly valued in Canada.", "group": "strong_alignment" }, { "title": "Multilingual and Multicultural Experience", "description": "Fluency in English (C1 EF SET) and Portuguese, with proven multi-cultural remote work exposure.", "group": "strong_alignment" }, { "title": "Diverse Industry and Project Background", "description": "Successful track record delivering solutions across industries: SaaS, fintech, utilities, and more.", "group": "strong_alignment" }, { "title": "Limited Canadian Work Experience", "description": "No direct Canadian employer experience, but demonstrates significant international remote work on North American projects.", "group": "moderate_gap" }, { "title": "Formal Certifications", "description": "Professional development is evidenced through bootcamps and courses, yet lacks formal Canadian-specific certifications.", "group": "moderate_gap" }, { "title": "French Language Skills", "description": "Does not mention proficiency in French, which could be relevant for some parts of Canada.", "group": "missing_requirement" } ], "reasoning": "Your resume is extremely well-aligned for Canadian tech roles, especially in remote-first or globally-minded companies. The breadth of technical expertise and leadership in modern tech stacks makes you a highly attractive candidate. A few regional additions, such as mentioning Francophone skills where required, could bring you even closer to perfection. Keep up the outstanding work—Canadian employers will appreciate your readiness and impact!", "top_choice": "" }
